pa med do// 'du byang chub chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'dus pa med de// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa 'am//
mchags pa zhes bya ba'i 'du shes pa med// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su ma 'grig/ mo bstan kyang yongs su
mi 'grig/ bstan kyang mi 'phel/ ma bstanakyang mi 'a ngal pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin ni// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/
chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su ma 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su ma 'grib/ bstan kyang ma 'phal/ ma bstan kyang ma 'pha 'ad/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de
bzhin ba/ shigs pa dgra btsem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing/ nam na la'i 'gugs pa 'am ma legs pa brjod kyang/ ma mkha' ni
legs pa brjod pa yongs su 'bul ba mad do// nyes pa brjod pas yongs su 'greng pa mar de// nam mkha' ni 'gas pa brjod kyang chags pa yod de// nyes pa brjod kyang
khong khro ba med de/ rang 'byor 'di lta ste/ dpar na sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyad ka phal pa mad de// nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'a grib pa mang do// 'gas pa
brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do/ nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro thal 'gyur ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ chos rnams kyi ches nyer gang ngan pa de bstan kyang de bzhin//
ma bstan kyang de bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod rung shes rab kyi pa 'al tu phyin pa/
bstan pa'o/ zhum pa dang/ g.yeng ba' mi 'gyur pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga la de la brtson par bgyid cing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ra 'i byang chub lasu slar
mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyed pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltaste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnams kyi sa bab kyi ba lo'adzatu phyin ra pa skyom pa 'di ni/
ma mkha' bsgom pa ste/ nam mkha' la ne gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// 'du shes ma mchis so// 'du byed mamachis so// rnam par shes pa mchis so////
nam mkha' la ni mig ma mches so// rna ba ma mams// sna ma mchis so// lcem mchis so// lus ma mchis so// yang mamachis// nam mkha' la ni gzugs mums
sod+hA ma mchin no/// dri ma mchis so/// ro ma mchis so// rig ma mchis so// chos ma mchis so// nam mkha' la na mig gi rnam par sa pa ma mchis so// na ba'i rnam
thubya// bar shes ba ma mchis so/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// lce'i rnam pa shes pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mches so// yid kyi rnam
lags pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' lani meg gi 'dus rig pa ma mchis so// na ba'i 'a dus te reg pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg nga ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg
pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mamachis so// nam mkha' lani mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so//
rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ sna'i 'dus pa'i ga nga las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa su byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// lus
kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// ma mkha' 'a nas 'i khams ma ma sa so// chu'i khams ma mchis
so[;]ma'i khamasam 5chas so// rlung ga khams ma mchis so// mamakha'i khams mams so// rnam pa/2 shes pa'i khams ma mchis so// nam mkha' la na ma rig pa ma mchis
sod 'du byed ma mchis so// rnam pa'i shes pa mams so/ ming dang gzugs ma mtshes so/ skye mched drug ma mchis so// rig pa ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// srid pa
chams so/ len pa ma mchis so// srid ra ma mchis// skye ba ma mchis so// d+hag ma mchis so// nam mkha' lan sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mamachisas// tshul khrims kyi pa
po' tuphyin pa ma mchis so/// bzed pa'i rol tu phyin pa ma mas so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mamaches so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma masas// nam mkha' la ni nad stong pa nyidam mchis so// phyi stong pa nyer ma mchis so// spyi nad stong pa nyid ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyer ma min
so/ chen po stong pa nyid ma mchisas// don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mtha' 'as 'das
pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// thug ma dang tha ma mdang stod pa khyed mamachis so// der ba med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so chos thams cad
stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang gi mtshanyid stong pa nyer mamachis so// me dmigs pa stong pa 'dimamachis sa// dadas pa med pa stongang zhed ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
ma mchis so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so// yang dag pa ra sprod ba rnams ma mchis so//
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mas so// dbang po rnams ma mchis so// stobs rnams ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis so// 'phags
pa'i pa lam 5 lag brgyad pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams ma mchisas// tshad med pa rnams ma mchis so//
gzugs mer nga' snyam sang ba'ajug pa rnams ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa brgyang ma mchis so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so// rnam par thar
skyo ba'i sgo ster nga zheng dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa mar pa mamananaso// mngon pa rabs pa rnams ma mchis so// dang nge 'dzin rnams ma mas so// gzungs kyi sgo rnamA
ma mchis// nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so// mi 'jigs pa bzhim mchis so// so so yang dag par rtag pa bzhim mamen/so// byams pa chen
[@ ]lo mamanyis so// snying rje chen po mamachesas// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyadamamachas so// nam mkhar la ni rgyun du zhugs pa 'a 'bras bu ma mchisaso// lan cig/
phyi 'daba'i 'dras du ma mchis so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchisas// rad byang chub mamachis so// bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs/
pa'i byang chub ma mchis so/// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgyag gsum pa// brtsom ldan 'das byang chub
sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go ma 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang gis go ma 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson
par mos/ 'god par mos/ rtsol ba'amos ra dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad du ge ma 'tshol ba de dag ninam mkha' yongs su smin pa'i 'tshol zhir
yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang 'chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshol ba'o//
bcom ldan 'as sems can rnams kyi ron du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la gdeg pa'i 'atsha' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po gang
sa mas can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag brtson 'grus chen po theg pa 'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
dpa' sems ngal chen po gang sems can rnams kyi don du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po'atshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chug
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' lta bu'i sa rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bar 'gal ba de dag ni dpa' bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha btsal ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ 'di ltasta/ dang ra ma'aram bu'i tshalam/ 'od ma'i tshul lam/ bu ram shing gi tshul lam/ smig ma'i tshal la ma/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til
gyi zhing bzhin du/ de bzhin ga 'gan pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur 'a/ dbazhin gshags pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am bskal nga 'i lcagama' chos bstan te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa re res sems du na nga ma mchis grangasamams pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang/ bcom ldan 'das sams nun gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am/ 'gang bar mi gara'
tse 'od da ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchin pa dang/ sems can dban ra 'i slad du ste de bzhin du bu la te phye ga b.ru'i phug re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung ga bye ma
skar rag bde lta ste/ dang 'a na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'ang ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing dmi/ til gyi zhing bzhin du//
00 de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos khongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dgagis kyang bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag ma'amos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res
sems can tshad mas grangasamamachis pa yongs su myungan las bzlas kyang/ sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am/ 'gang ba'amegana' 'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ sems can
ma mchis pa dang/ sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des// bdag 'di skad du sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag nga 'a rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal pa der ni/ nam mkha' yongs su sminapa' bgyi bar 'tshal zhing/ yongs su ragrol bar bgyi bar 'tshalang lags zhes mchi'o// de nas/
dge slong gtsig cig 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la mes gang yang skye ba dad 'gag pa yang med la/ tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phur pa yang yod/ shes rab
kyi phur pa yang yod/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po yang yod/ rnam par grol ba'i yabasa mthong pa'i phud po yang yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yor/ lan cig phyir
'ong ba'i 'thas ba yang yod/mi'od ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang yod/rad byang chub kyang 'bod/ blanam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa yang yod/
[61]bya/ lan cig rgyu 'ong ba yang yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba yang yod/ dgra bcom pa yang yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/ de bzhin g.yugs pa ragra bcom pa yang//
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos dkon mchog kyang yod/ ngag 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod/
khor pa'i bcom ldan 'angs ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal te snyam pa dang/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa zab 'byor la 'di skad ces
snus ko// btsun nga ba 'byer byang chub sems dang lngasams dpa' chen po gad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/ de gang la brtson
nga'i phyir nga yin/ 'bu 'dur gyis smras pa// ke'u gi ka gang bas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa 'o// de nas lca'i
dbang po brgya byin gyis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad nusu gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gangs rab kyi bshel tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa
dang 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dad/ bskyang ba dang/ bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsa' du gsol// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ba 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kolugaka khyed kyis gang la bsrung
ba dang/ bskyang ba dang/ bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa// btsunapa rab 'byer bdag/gas gang la bsrung ba dang// bskyang ba dang/ bskyab
par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// rab 'byor gyis smas pa/ ko'u shi kagal te rags kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i shas rab kyi 'bol
tu phyin pa la gnas ni/ de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang/ bskyud pa dang/ bskyab par 'gyur ro// gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na//
de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa glags tshol pa rnams kyi glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// gang ji skad du bstanang 'i shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo de ni mes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig pa' bya'o/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa'ol tu phyin pa la sbyong nga rnams bsrung
ba dang/ bskyang ba dang/ bskyab par gang sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang/ bskyang ba dang/ bskyab par sems nga ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i
u'u/ skal ba can du 'gyur 'o/ ko'u shi ka nga ji snyam du son// khyod kyin skya ma dang/ smig rgyu dang/ rmi lam dang/ sgra brnyan da/ mig yor dang/ sprul pa la bsrung
ba dang/ bskyang ba drang/ bayang nus sam/brgyan gyis smatsapa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi 'ot+ta tu phyin pa la sbyong nga rnams bsdur ba der/ bskyang ba dang/ bskyab par gang san su da ri ni/ bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur
ro ko'u shika re rje snyam du sems// khyed kyis re bzhin rigs/nga 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba ngang/ bskyang ba dang/ bskyab pa'i nus sam// brgya
byin gyis smras nga/ btsunar rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// smras pa/ ko'u ba ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dong 'a sems dpa' chen po bas lag kyi phalo' tu phyin ra la sbyor pa rnams
sprang ba dad/ bskyang ba dang/ bskyab par gang dems pa de ni/ bsam nga ltar ma 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur te/ ko'u shAka de je skam du sams/ khyed kyis chos
kyi dbyangs dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyangs la bsur ba dang/ bskyang bar ng/ bskyab par nus nam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ ]
bas/ btsun pa rab 'byor nga ni mi nus so// smras pa ke'u sha ka re bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor pa rnams bsrung ba dang//
bskyang ba dang/ bskyab par gang sams pa de ni/ bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po pachubyan gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun nga 2ba 'byor ji tsam gyis no/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor nga sa/ rmi lam lta bu'i
chos dang/ sgyum lta bu dang smig rgyu lta bu dang/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang/ mig yor lta bu dang/ sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa drang/ de ltar yongs su shes pas/
byang chub sems dar 'a sems dpa' chos bo/ rmi lam ma samus su ma byed rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byer/ rmi lam la rlom sems su ma byer/ glu ma rlom sems su ma byed/
sgyu mas rlom sems su me khyer/ sgyum la rlom sems sumi byed/ smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed smig rgyus rlom sems su ma phyid/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su ma byed/ sgra bltan
blom sems su ma byed/ sgra bat+tan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su ma byung/ mig yorlom sems su ma phyir/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/
mig yor la rlom sems su me byed/ sprul pa blom sems su ma byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byer/ sprul pa la rlom sems su ma byed pa yin no// rab
'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' man nganga' chen ngo shes rab kyi ja bol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i/ gajugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis
rlom sems su mi byed/ ga gsal rlom sems su ma byed na/ de rmi lamarlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su ma phyid/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ dad
sgyu marlom sems su ma byad/ sgyu mas rdzomasams su ma myong/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed ngo// de smag rgya rlom sems su ma byed/ smag rgyus rem sAms su mkhyad/ smig rgyu la/
ma sems su mi byed de// de sgra garAn rlom sems su ma byeng/ sgra brnan gyis rlomasams su ma byung sgra brtan la rlom sems su me byang do// dmig yor rlom sems su mi bya
mig yo gi ma mas su ma phyed/ mag lor la rlom sems su ma byed ro// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byad/ sprul pa la rlom sems su
mi byed de// ka' sha ka gal te byang chub sems dapa' sems dang 'chen po nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'i []/ tshor ba rlom sems su ma byed/ tshor bas rlom sems su
0/mekhyed/ tshor ba la rlom sems sum byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su me byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su ma byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems
sum myong/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do// da smig rgyu rlom sems su ma byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byeng de/ de sgra ba'an slog
sems sum byed/ sgra ban+tan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su me khyer de do/ dmig yor rlomasams su ma byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sanus/su ma byed/
mig yor la rom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su ma byed/ sprul pa sa rlom sems su ma byed/ sbrul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byad
chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ni/ 'du shes rlom sems su ma byed/ 'du shes kyis rlom son na su ma phyir/ 'du shes la rlom
sems su mi byed na/ re rmi lamarlomasams su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su ma byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas
rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyum 'a rlomasamasasum bying de// de smig rgyu rlomasams su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su ma byed re// de
bya// sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la blomasams su mi byed do// de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mes//
khor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la ma sems su ma byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su ma byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su ma byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su
ma phyir do// ko'u shi kagal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha bo'i tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshi 'du byeng rlom sems su mi byed/ 'du byed kyis rlom sems
su mi byed/ 'du byed la blom sems su mi byer na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su ma phyir ro// desgyu ma rlom
sems sumi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems sum byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/smig rgyusum sems su mi byed/smigau rgyu la rlos
sems su mi byed de// de sgra ban+tamarlom sems su mi byed sgra bstan gyis rlom som nan+tasu mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed de// de mag yor rlomasams su mi byed/
mig yor gyis rom sems su mi byed/ mag yor la rlom sems u mi phyed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems sum srid/ sprul pa la rlom sems su
mi byed de// ko shi ka ga' de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa mashes pablom sems su ma byer rnam par shes/

sems su mi phyod/ rna bas rlom sems su mi byed/ rna ba la rlom sems sum byed na/ da rmi lam rlom sems su mi phyed rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam
N+NaM la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgyu marlom semasum byed/ sgyu masarlom sems su mi byed/ sgyum la rlom sems su mi byed do// de smag rgyu rlom sems ma byed//

su me khyer de// demig yor rlom sems sum byed mig phor gyis rlomasems su me byeng/ mig yor la rlom sems su ma byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su me khyed/

byed smig rgyus rlom sems su ma byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su ma byed do// de sgra bam rlom semasu mi byed/ skabarnyan gyis rlom sems sume byad/ sgra bltan la rlom semA
su mi byed do// de mag yong+kam sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la romasams su mi byed de// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi phyed/ sprul

mi byed do// de mig yor 'om sems sum byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom somasasu ma byed do// de sprul brlomasams su ma byed/
@#// sbrul pas rlom sems sum byed/ sprul pa la rlomasams u ma byed ngo// ko'u shi kragal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshi/ rna ba 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rlom sems su mi byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sumasasu mi byed//
rna pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la rlom semasusume byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems sum byed/ rmi lam gyis rlomasams su ma gyur/ rmi lam la rlom sems
su ma phyed do// de sgyu marlom sems su ma byed/ sgyu mas ma sams sumi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su ma byed de// de smig rgyu rlom sems su ma byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su
mi byed/ smig rgyu lo rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgra pacha narlom sems sumakhyed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su ma byed do// ra mig yor
blom sams su mi spyod/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la blom sems su ma byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi
byed sprul pa la rlom sams sum khyed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sna'i 'dus te reg/
palas byung ba'i tshor ba ma sams sume byed/ sna' 'aate reg pa las byung ba'i tshor gsarlom sems su mi byed/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung bu'i tshor ba la rlomasams su mi
byung na/ de rmi lamaromasams sum byed/ rmi lam gyi rlom sems sum byed rmi lam la rlom sems su ma byed d// de spyamaromasams su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su
mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlomasams su mi byed do// de smig rgyu rlomasams su ma byed/ smig rgyus klomasamasasu mchid/ smig rgyu la rlomasems su mi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom som

yor la rlomasams su mi byed do// nga sprul pa rlom sa man/sum byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems sum byed do// ko'u shaka gal te byad rlub sems

ra 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha ro'o tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyi brlom sems su ma byed/ skya bas blom sems su ma byed/ skya ba lazlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom
sams su ma phyir/ rmi lam gyis rlomasams su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su me khyod/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la

sgra banyan gyis rlomasams su mi byed/ sgra ban+tan la rlomasamags mi byed do// de mig yor rlom sems su ma byed/ mig yon gyis rlom sems sum byed//
mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul ra rlom sems umi byed/ sprul pa su rlom sems sum byed/ sprul pa 'a rnyom sams su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chug
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha re'ang tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'i tsho/ ga gi ma sems su ma byed/ rgo shas rlom sems su ma byed/ rga shi la rlom sams su mkhyer
ma de rmi lam rlom sems su ma byed/ rmilam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi phyed ro// desgyu ma rlom sems su ma byed/ sgyu masarlom sems

su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyanal rlom nyams su ma phyid do// dmig yor rlomasams su mi byed M mig yor gyis rlom sems su micad/ mig
loral rlomasams su mi byed de// de sprul pa blom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlomasams sum byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed da//
kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya go bzhi pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thoms cad mkhyen pa nyid rlom sems sum byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/

mig yor gyi gsarlom man/su ma byed/ me yos lazlom sems su ma byed do/ zhe sprul pa rlom sems su ma byed/ sprul pas rlom dmas su ma byed/ sbrag pa la
blos soms su ma byed de// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag 6rgya pa bam po brgya ga lnga pa// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum
gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ri'i kyi lha dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dar/ mtshe ma'i lha dad/ dga' ldan gyi lha dang/ 'phrul dga'i lha dad
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang/ tshangs ris kyi lha dang/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang/ tshangs chen gyi lha dang/ snang ba'i lha dad/ chung snang gi lha
dang tshod med snang ba'i lha dang/ kumasnang dang ba'i lha dad/ drag ba'i lha dang/ chung dag lha dang/ tshar med dge ba'i lha dang/ dag rgyas kyi lha dad/ che ba'i lha dang/ chung de'i lha dang/
tshod med che ba'i ltadang/ 'dus bu chi ba'i lA dad/ mi rgyu ba'i lha dang/ mi gdung pa'i lta dang/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha dad/ gya nom snang ba'i lha dang/ 'og min gyi lha dang lha gang je

'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bas phyag 'tshate phyogs gcig tu bakhod de// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byan dad mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs
pa la/ kun snang rad pa'i lha rnams r/ dag rgyas kyi lha rnams dad/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i 'os kyi lha rnams// sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs
kyisangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zabamo 'di
da dad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'adi nyid zhu ba dang/ de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su drib mas la snang
bar gyur// lho phyogs kyisangs rgyas stod yig 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston// mtshon 'di dag nyid ma' ba/ dag slob 'byor ces bya ba na stag gas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
pa zab mo 'di nyid dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'de nyid zhu ba dang/ de lha' dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dril
sems la snang bar 'gyur to// nub phyogasakyisangs rgyas stong yi ga 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa// mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dag slong 'ab 'byor ces bya ba sha stagags/ shes
[ ]// thab kyi pha chog tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'de nyer zhu ba dang/ de na lha'ibang bo brgya byin gyis/ shes nyag kyi pha stel 'byan
pa'i le'u 'de nyid zhu zhing yongasau de la sems lasnang ba'agyur te/ byang phyogs kyisangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/mtshan 'di dag khyed mnga' ba/ dag slong skaba'akhyer
ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang/ de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyis/
rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di skyed zhu zhing longs su dri la soms la snang ba' gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyisangs rgyas stod yig 'dadaganyid kyis chos ston r/mtshan 'di dganyidamanga' ba/
dge slong ba 'byer ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga lha mo 'di nyid yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u da tir zhu ba dang/ de na la'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri bsems lasnang bar gyur te// shAr lho'i phyogs mtshams kyisangs rgyas stong yig 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'adi dag

nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byogatses bya ba sha stag gas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'adi nyid zhub dang/ de na lha'i dbang po brgya
byin gyis/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'de nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar 'gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong ye ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa

mtshan 'di dag khyed mda' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyed dung/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir 'a le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang/ de na lha'i

dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi ras rgyug stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis
chos ston pa/ mtshan 'adi dag nyid mnga' ba/ dag slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stagags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dad/ zhes 'ab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di
nyid zhu ba dang/ de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i lag 'di nyed zhu zhing yongs su dri bsems la snang bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa// mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong 'ab 'byor ces bya ba stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'adi nyid zhub dang/ de kalha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhuzhing yongs su dri bsams la snang ba'i rgyan to// steng gi

phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston ng/ mtshan 'di dag nyidama' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid nas// phyo gas kyi as rgyas stong la
ga 'bakye phathol tu phyin ng 'di'u 'de nyid zhub dang/ de nalha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// sa 'bakyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'adi nyed zhu zhing yongs su drib sems la snang bar gyur to// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ba 'byor byang chub sems dang/ 'asems dpa' chen po byams pa yang/ sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag pa'
lags nga 'i dbachub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro// gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang/ sa'i phyogs 'di nyir du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
nyid ston cing 'chad ra' 'grub 'a// gsol ra// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang/ rgyugs gang dang/ mnam gangagis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na mad ra/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ gnyis zab kyi phaphel tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
tshadad ldan pa rang 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di la rab 'byor byang chub sems dang shasems dpa' chen ngo byams pa gla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
rgyas nas/ gzugs gces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba'i chos ston par mi 'gyur ra gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bag med rtses bya ba'i chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par ma 'gyur ro// gzugs zhe zhes bya ba
'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston pa'i m 'gyur ro// gzugs b.rungs zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya ba sa ston par mi 'gyur// gzugs 'das zhes bya ba'i chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
gzugs ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston pa ma 'gyur 'o// gzugs da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston pa' mi 'gyur ro// tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi
'gyur ro// tshor ba 'di zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston pa' ma 'gyur// tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'i chos ston pa' ma'agyu ba'o// tshor ba sdug
ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya ba' chos ston pa'i m 'gyur ro// tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya ba'i chos ston pa'i 'gyur// tshor ba bcings zhes bya pa rnam grol zhes
bya ba'achos ston pa ma 'gruba'o// tshor ba 'das zhes bya ba'achos ston pa'i m 'gyur ro// tshor ba ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par ma 'gyur 'o// tshor ba da ltar byung zhes bya/
kyi bar chos ston pa'i m 'gyur 'o'adu shes rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces phyu pa' chos stson pa'i mi 'gyura'o// 'dushes bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mes ston par mi
'gyura'o// 'du shes thadag nges bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston pa'i m 'gyur ro// 'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am/ ma sgrug ces bya ba'i chos ston pa'i m 'gyur so// 'du shes zhi sa
bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston pa'i m brgyudabo// 'du sa patsharis zhes bya pa 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du shes 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur te//
'du shes ma 'ongs zhes bya la chos ston par mi 'gyur re// 'du shes ra ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par ma 'gyur// 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya par chos ston pa'i ma 'grub bo//
'du byed thade zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba la chos ston ng la mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed bdag ces bya pa 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'amos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed sdug leg
bya ba 'am/ mi sdug thes bya ba'i chos ston par mi 'gyularo// 'du byed zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhe zhes bya bar chos ston nga 'a ma 'gyur ro/ 'du byed bcings zhes bya la ma/ grol zhes bya ba'as
